title: WATCH: Marlon Pack - Bristol City Teammates 2.0
description: Bristol City's Marlon Pack reveals all about his team-mates ahead of their Carabao Cup semi-final clash with Manchester City.
content: Pack's side are 2-1 down going into the second leg at Ashton Gate, which is live on Sky Sports Football from 7.30pm on Tuesday.Pack answers Soccer AM's questions about his Bristol City team-mates, including who is the most intelligent, who is the hard man, and who has the worst dress sense.The midfielder, 26, joined Bristol City from Cheltenham in 2013, and has played over 200 times for the Robins since.Lee Johnson's side knocked Manchester United out in the quarter-final at Ashton Gate and the club are also chasing promotion to the Premier League from the Championship, sitting fifth place, five points off second.Marlon Pack was speaking ahead of Bristol City's Carabao Cup semi-final second leg against Manchester City on Tuesday night. For more exclusive pre-match content, follow www.twitter.com/carabaouk
